Templar: Right... Let's get going, I guess...

He backed up to Kenzo and opened a small hatch, too small for Kenzo 
to fit in.

Templar: Blackfang, is it? Load him up, and strap him as good as you 
can. I won't be able to go very fast with him, but at least I can 
carry him.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

>

> you, Templar, carry Kenzo if we have the bad luck to find an 
enemie 
> you two will go to base, I'll delay him as long as I can while you 
> arrive and sent me reforses... Lets go!"
> 
> Windlord started to walk, while he was alert of Area
